items.title:
ğŸ’¡ Using the Draw Things Mask Layer to Manipulate lighting!

ğŸ–±ï¸ From left to right, you only need a few simple clicks.

ğŸ¨ Inspired by @linoy_tsaban  and @lvminzhang 's LuminaBrush, our community creators built a Luminance Mask Generator. You can paint the lighting positions and colors, and the Luminance Mask will be generated automatically. The prompt will also be generated automatically, and you can set the light type and background as well.

ğŸ“‹ Copy the Luminance Mask â†’ Draw Things Mask Layer â†’ Paste as mask, and copy-paste the prompt. Then generate directly with FLUX.2 [klein] 9B.
items.description:
ğŸ’¡ Using the Draw Things Mask Layer to Manipulate lighting!

ğŸ–±ï¸ From left to right, you only need a few simple clicks.

ğŸ¨ Inspired by @linoy_tsaban  and @lvminzhang 's LuminaBrush, our community creators built a Luminance Mask Generator. You can paint the lighting positions and colors, and the Luminance Mask will be generated automatically. The prompt will also be generated automatically, and you can set the light type and background as well.

ğŸ“‹ Copy the Luminance Mask â†’ Draw Things Mask Layer â†’ Paste as mask, and copy-paste the prompt. Then generate directly with FLUX.2 [klein] 9B.
